name: Samsara (itch) (Vieruz)
description:
In this game, you will play a consciousness who will experiment the cycle of existence.

Use arrow keys to move.

Use ctrl or mouse click to use your spiritual power. (Take care to avoid bad Karma)

Use space bar to meditate. (Tips : hold space bar & down arrow key at the same time to inspire. The same applies to expire)

Use escape key to quit.

Discover the 12 links of dependent origination through this story.

Thanks for having play my game.

Game made for Extra Credits Game Jam #3 on the topic : Cycles.
